Specimen Type: Serum, Plasma, Urine, or other bodily fluids (as applicable)
Purpose: To provide accurate and timely analysis of specimens for miscellaneous chemistry assays not included in routine testing protocols.
Container: Appropriate, properly labeled specimen containers (e.g., serum or plasma tubes, urine collection cup) per specific assay requirements
Equipment: Automated chemistry analyzer, manual pipettes, centrifuge, and other necessary laboratory equipment
